# 24/7 URL Trigger Worker (PHP)

This project runs a continuous background worker that triggers URL groups at
different intervals:

- Group 1: every 28 seconds  
- Group 2: every 58 seconds  
- Group 3: every 178 seconds  
- Group 4: every 298 seconds  
- Group 5: every 597 seconds  

## Deploy to Render

1. Push this repo to GitHub  
2. Go to https://render.com  
3. Click **New → Background Worker**  
4. Connect your repo  
5. Deploy

Done — Runs 24/7 automatically.
